mapper.sql: ID, CODE, NAME, MONEY, DEMAND_SECTOR, BUDGET, YEAR, BUDGET_SUBJECT_ITEM, APPROVAL_NUMBER, DOCUMENT_NUMBER, QUA_CODE, STATUS, PURCHASE_DEP_NAME, PURCHASE_LEGAL, PURCHASE_AGENT, PURCHASE_CONTACT, PURCHASE_CONTACT_TELEPHONE, PURCHASE_CONTACT_ADDRESS, PURCHASE_UNITPOST_CODE, PURCHASE_PAY_DEP, PURCHASE_BANK, PURCHASE_BANK_ACCOUNT, SUPPLIER_DEP_NAME, SUPPLIER_LEGAL, SUPPLIER_AGENT, SUPPLIER_CONTACT, SUPPLIER_CONTACT_TELEPHONE, SUPPLIER_CONTACT_ADDRESS, SUPPLIER_UNITPOST_CODE, SUPPLIER_BANK, SUPPLIER_BANK_ACCOUNT, SUPPLIER_BANK_NAME,SUPPLIER_PUR_ID,PROJECT_NAME, IS_APPEAL,APPROVE_PIC,CREATED_AT,UPDATED_AT,IS_DELETED,CONTRACT_TYPE,DRAFT_GIT_AT,DRAFT_REVIEWED_AT, FORMAL_GIT_AT,FORMAL_REVIEWED_AT,IS_IMPORT,IS_DECLARE,PURCHASE_TYPE,PROJECT_ID,FINALLY_CLOSED, BING_DEP_NAME,BING_CONTACT,BING_CONTACT_TELEPHONE,BING_CONTACT_ADDRESS,BING_UNITPOST_CODE,SUPPLIER_CHECK_IDS,PROJECT_CODE,MANUAL_TYPE,FORMAL_AT
mapper.select:
select
,
from T_BSS_CS_PURCHASE_CONTRACT where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status = '0'

select
,
from T_BSS_CS_PURCHASE_CONTRACT where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status = '2'

select
from T_BSS_CS_PURCHASE_CONTRACT where STATUS = '1' and IS_DELETED = '0'
and PROJECT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{projectName}), '%')
and CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{code}), '%')
and SUPPLIER_DEP_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{supplierDepName}), '%')
and PURCHASE_DEP_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{purchaseDepName}), '%')
and DEMAND_SECTOR like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{demandSector}), '%')
and DOCUMENT_NUMBER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{documentNumber}), '%')
and YEAR = #{year}
and BUDGET_SUBJECT_ITEM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{budgetSubjectItem}), '%')
order by UPDATED_AT DESC

select
from T_BSS_CS_PURCHASE_CONTRACT where IS_DELETED = '0' and status in (1,2,0)

select
from T_BSS_CS_PURCHASE_CONTRACT where IS_DELETED = '0'
and PROJECT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{projectName}), '%')
and status = #{status}
and CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{code}), '%')
and SUPPLIER_DEP_NAME IN (SELECT ID FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER WHERE SUPPLIER_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{supplierDepName}), '%'))
and PURCHASE_DEP_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{purchaseDepName}), '%')
and DEMAND_SECTOR like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{demandSector}), '%')
and DOCUMENT_NUMBER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{documentNumber}), '%')
and YEAR = #{year}
and DEMAND_SECTOR = #{deptname}
and BUDGET_SUBJECT_ITEM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{budgetSubjectItem}), '%')
order by status

select
from T_BSS_CS_PURCHASE_CONTRACT where IS_DELETED = '0'
and PROJECT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{projectName}), '%')
and CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{code}), '%')
and SUPPLIER_DEP_NAME IN (SELECT ID FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER WHERE SUPPLIER_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{supplierDepName}), '%'))
and PURCHASE_DEP_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{purchaseDepName}), '%')
and PURCHASE_DEP_NAME IN (SELECT ID FROM T_SES_OMS_ORG WHERE NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{purchaseDepShortName}), '%'))
and DEMAND_SECTOR like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{demandSector}), '%')
and DOCUMENT_NUMBER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{documentNumber}), '%')
and DEMAND_SECTOR = #{deptname}
and YEAR like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{year}), '%')
and BUDGET_SUBJECT_ITEM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{budgetSubjectItem}), '%')
and status in (0,1,2) order by status,CREATED_AT desc

select
from T_BSS_CS_PURCHASE_CONTRACT where IS_DELETED = '0'
and PROJECT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{projectName}), '%')
and CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{code}), '%')
and SUPPLIER_DEP_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{supplierDepName}), '%')
and PURCHASE_DEP_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{purchaseDepName}), '%')
and DEMAND_SECTOR like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{demandSector}), '%')
and DOCUMENT_NUMBER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{documentNumber}), '%')
and YEAR = #{year}
and BUDGET_SUBJECT_ITEM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{budgetSubjectItem}), '%')
and status in (0,1,2) and SUPPLIER_DEP_NAME=#{supplierId} order by status

select
from T_BSS_CS_PURCHASE_CONTRACT where STATUS = '0' and IS_DELETED = '0'
and PROJECT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{projectName}), '%')
and CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{code}), '%')
and SUPPLIER_DEP_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{supplierDepName}), '%')
and PURCHASE_DEP_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{purchaseDepName}), '%')
and DEMAND_SECTOR like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{demandSector}), '%')
and DOCUMENT_NUMBER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{documentNumber}), '%')
and YEAR = #{year}
and BUDGET_SUBJECT_ITEM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{budgetSubjectItem}), '%')
order by UPDATED_AT DESC

select
from T_BSS_CS_PURCHASE_CONTRACT where STATUS = '2'
and PROJECT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{projectName}), '%')
and CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{code}), '%')
and SUPPLIER_DEP_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{supplierDepName}), '%')
and PURCHASE_DEP_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{purchaseDepName}), '%')
and DEMAND_SECTOR like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{demandSector}), '%')
and DOCUMENT_NUMBER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{documentNumber}), '%')
and YEAR = #{year}
and BUDGET_SUBJECT_ITEM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{budgetSubjectItem}), '%')
order by UPDATED_AT DESC
mapper.update: update T_BSS_CS_PURCHASE_CONTRACT set IS_DELETED = '1' where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_BSS_CS_PURCHASE_CONTRACT
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MONEY = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEMAND_SECTOR = #{demandSector,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUDGET = #{budget,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUDGET_SUBJECT_ITEM = #{budgetSubjectItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVAL_NUMBER = #{approvalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOCUMENT_NUMBER = #{documentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUA_CODE = #{quaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PURCHASE_DEP_NAME = #{purchaseDepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASE_LEGAL = #{purchaseLegal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASE_AGENT = #{purchaseAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASE_CONTACT = #{purchaseContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASE_CONTACT_TELEPHONE = #{purchaseContactTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASE_CONTACT_ADDRESS = #{purchaseContactAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASE_UNITPOST_CODE = #{purchaseUnitpostCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASE_PAY_DEP = #{purchasePayDep,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASE_BANK = #{purchaseBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASE_BANK_ACCOUNT = #{purchaseBankAccount},
SUPPLIER_DEP_NAME = #{supplierDepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_LEGAL = #{supplierLegal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_AGENT = #{supplierAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_CONTACT = #{supplierContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_CONTACT_TELEPHONE = #{supplierContactTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_CONTACT_ADDRESS = #{supplierContactAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_UNITPOST_CODE = #{supplierUnitpostCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_BANK = #{supplierBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_BANK_ACCOUNT = #{supplierBankAccount},
SUPPLIER_BANK_NAME = #{supplierBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_PUR_ID = #{supplierPurId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT = #{content},
PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName},
IS_APPEAL = #{isAppeal},
APPROVE_PIC = #{approvePic},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted},
CONTRACT_TYPE = #{contractType},
DRAFT_GIT_AT = #{draftGitAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DRAFT_REVIEWED_AT = #{draftReviewedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FORMAL_GIT_AT = #{formalGitAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FORMAL_REVIEWED_AT = #{formalReviewedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_IMPORT = #{isImport},
IS_DECLARE = #{isDeclare},
PURCHASE_TYPE = #{purchaseType},
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId},
FINALLY_CLOSED = #{finallyClosed},
BING_DEP_NAME = #{bingDepName},
BING_CONTACT = #{bingContact},
BING_CONTACT_TELEPHONE = #{bingContactTelephone},
BING_CONTACT_ADDRESS = #{bingContactAddress},
BING_UNITPOST_CODE = #{bingUnitpostCode},
PROJECT_CODE = #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANUAL_TYPE = #{manualType},
FORMAL_AT=#{formalAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
